title: The Undertaker:Masquerade
description: Kate Grainger is a 23-year-old woman in Scotland in 1858 who inherits her father's undertaking business. Kate is also desperate to become a doctor, but despite the University of Edinburgh Medical School being right on her doorstep, women are not permitted to study there. With the help of her little spirit friend she seeks out a doctor who may be able to help her in her quest. She thinks she knows his secret - but does she? 'The Undertaker:Masquerade' is a sequel to 'The Undertaker' and takes place three months after Kate's first adventure. You don't need to have read the first book to enjoy the sequel.
author: Carmel McMurdo Audsley
